item.title: Trying Module Linker
item.dc:creator: Senthil Kumaran
item.description: This project, "Module Linker, a Chrome Extension for browsing source code" seems like an interesting one. It hyper-links the github source code imports and while browsing code in github, we can automatically follow to it's documentation.

item.title: Git Clean Shortcuts
item.dc:creator: Senthil Kumaran
item.description:
I added these git clean short-cut aliases to my config.

[alias]
   cls = clean -x -n -e *.iml -e .idea
   cl = clean -x -f -e *.iml -e .idea

Often, I would mistakenly delete my IntelliJ idea files and I will loose the various customizations I had done. This setup will prevent the mishap from happening again.
